item.title: Tahini Brown Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: Ingredients ¾ cup Unsalted butter ¼ cup tahini ½ cup white sugar 1½ cups brown sugar 2 eggs 300g flour 1 tsp baking soda 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp kosher salt ¾ tsp cinnamon 230g chocolate chips Nuts (walnuts or your favorite) Instructions Brown the butter. Let it cool til its resolidified. Mix the butter, tahini, white sugar and brown sugar (ideally in a stand mixer). Mix to combine.
